game_description: App Lab's "YOU GENERATION VR Live" has been updated as "YOU GENERATION LIVE VR" an application offering the same features as the smartphone version of "YOU GENERATION LIVE". You can download it for free at Quest Store. Check an official site for more detail. https://colopl.co.jp/yougeneration/ Thank you for your support of "YOU GENERATION LIVE VR". ※The App Lab version of "YOUGENERATION VR Live" has been sunset the service. --- “YOU GENERATION VR Live Beta” is an unique app that allows viewers to participate in a live virtual space program streamed by game characters in 3D graphics. This live streaming program will be the world's first interactive entertainment experience where game characters interact with tens of thousands of viewers in real time. --- This app is intended for residents of Japan.
review_1: Its fun Not all bad music lowkey Played it twice
review_2: Watch Vtubers from Japan (I think) in VR! truthfully unless you speak the language your likely not going to get a huge amount out of this app but I was able to watch pre recorded streams and the character models of the Vtubers look really good in the headset. I know this isn't going to be for everyone but I think its worth downloading and checking out for those into anime and stuff from Japan. Video - https://youtu.be/b98dVZ82IKs
review_3: But add English language please! I don't understand Japanese, then 5 stars thank u.
